name: gps-rovers-2010
title: GPS Rover Positions (2010)
description: Daily to 30-second positions of six GPS rovers placed on the glacier surface in 2010.

contributors.name: Alberto Behar
contributors.roles: Designed and built the GPS rovers.

resources.name: netrs
resources.title: Upper Glacier Rover Positions (NETRS)
resources.description: Daily positions for the three rovers above Divider Mountain, processed using PPP from NETRS data. Positions for each rover are split into two tracks due to the dig-out on 2010-05-17 (Ian Howat, `sources/Columbia netrs daily solutions.eml`).

resources.name: edgee
resources.title: Lower Glacier Rover Positions (EDGEE)
resources.description: 30-second positions for the three rovers below Divider Mountain, processed from EDGEE data using GrafNav. Positions for some rovers are split into multiple tracks due to relocations (Ian Howat, `sources/columbia_edgee_2010.m`).

fields.name: t
fields.description: ISO 8601 date and time (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss) in UTC.

fields.name: xy_sd
fields.description: Standard deviation (m) in horizontal position (x, y).

fields.name: quality
fields.description: GrafNav position quality metric (smaller numer = higher quality).
